member.name: T:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.afRemoteFileStoreLayer.GetPreferredLocationID
member.summary: Gets the preferred location ID specified in the appSettings section

member.name: M:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.afRemoteFileStoreLayer.GetUseFileStoreException
member.summary: Gets the preferred way to throw an exception (specified in AppSettings section as UseFilestoreException). If true should throw FilestoreException and Exception for false. Will throw an exception if value in UseFilestoreException can not be cast to boolean.

member.name: T:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.eFileStoreExceptionType
member.summary: Defines type of error when working with filestore files.

member.name: F:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.eFileStoreExceptionType.RecordNotFound
member.summary: Table record was not found in application files table.

member.name: F:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.eFileStoreExceptionType.NullFileReference
member.summary: Reference to filestore file not set in application files table ([FileRef] is null)

member.name: F:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.eFileStoreExceptionType.DatabaseFileNotFound
member.summary: File does not exist in system files table.

member.name: F:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.eFileStoreExceptionType.MalformedFileMetadata
member.summary: Data about file is not valid or not full.

member.name: F:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.eFileStoreExceptionType.FileStoreFileLocationNotFound
member.summary: File location does not exist or is not accsesible.

member.name: F:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.eFileStoreExceptionType.FileStoreFileNotFound
member.summary: File is not found in filestore location.

member.name: F:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.eFileStoreExceptionType.FileStoreFileAlreadyExists
member.summary: File already exists in filestore location.

member.name: F:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.eFileStoreExceptionType.FileStoreFileExtensionNotAccepted
member.summary: File extension is not accepted by whitelist.

member.name: T:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.FilestoreException
member.summary: Exception that is raised when error occur handling file store files.

member.name: P:Appframe3.Common.Remoting.FilestoreException.FileStoreExceptionType
member.summary: Defines cause of exception see eFileStoreExceptionType
